column4: hello, anybody can help me? i clone my phisical server to virtual using vmware 5.0 converter ( 10.10 lts \ i686 ) but have a failed boot vm. I do some things to install grub 2 again, but failed all. grub error: symbol 'grub_puts_' not found  - is now )
i can't loading my system. couse have problem with grub
-_- 10.10 is super-pupper secure nano ubuntu, what have non-material system and not ubuntu ?
time to build your own server then i guess and transfer stuff over
you just said you were not using ubuntu.. but debian
you are not being clear... the server is ubuntu. but your desktop is debian?
you are confuseing people with what you are saying....
if  your 10.10 server is dead. id build a new server, move the hard drive over and transfer the needed data, or use a live cd to transfer it over
there was no need to set a root password. and it looksa like your windos partitions are all messed up or partioned weirdly
pastebin the exact commands and exact error messages
what do you think about it ?
i need delete /boot folder and reinstall grub again ?
i would guess that you got some weird hard drive parrtitions going on.
